question: Who of the following wins 'Best Boxer' title in AIBA Women's Youth World Championship?
explanation: Ankushita Boro 17-year-old girl from Assam won 'The Best Boxer title' in AIBA World Youth Women's Boxing Championship held in Guwahati. Ankushita Boro won the fifth gold with her bout against Russia's Ekaterina Dynnik in the 64kg final. India also secured two bronze medals through Neha Yadav and Anupama in 81 kg weight category in this championship.
